moves.4. Bb5 Bc5 5. Bxc6 dxc6 6. d3 Bg4 7. h3: HE's trying to rid his doubled pawn.
moves.10. Be3 Bxf3 11. Qxf3 c6 12. Bxd4 cxd4 1: I usually don't know when it's a good time to castle so i immediately castle after the opponent has.
moves.15... Qc5 16. Rfc1 h5 17. Ng3 h4 18. Nh5: F6 would be the killer move here.
moves.20. Nf6+: But... I use G6 To my advantage

moves.33. Qxd4 Qf8 34. Ree1 Rf4f2 35. Qxa7: Taking his pawns one by one. I know it will do me good in the end game( Thats if i don't die before)
moves.35... Rg7: ?? And Here is the Blunder. HE had forgotten that my Queen was still striking F2.
It's not particularly good to exchange pieces in a losing position
moves.43... Rf7 44. Rxf7+ Qxf7 45. Qf5: And again. Exchanging pieces in a losing position.
moves.46... Kxf7 47. Rf1+ Ke7 48. g4 Ke6 49. g: Nows he's throwing his last attack. Do or Die.
